root: ^Hanae! Hanae! Look at all the grass around the village. It's starting to look alive again.
^The blessing from the Goddess Flora is really amazing.
^I think it's more than just the Goddess Flora.
^You see Anko, it's all the love and care you put into planting flowers around the village that really helped the vegetation in the area thrive.
^You might have the potential a great Royal Flower Picker yet.
^You think so? Then I must continue practicing my flower picking skills.
^Hanae, my mama's birthday is coming up soon and I would like to make a small flower arangement for her.
^That sounds lovely Anko, I'm willing to help as much as I can with your arrangement.
^Great! I will pick pink flowers in this area, try to gather some white flowers from the ruins up north.
^I can't wait to see how this arrangement turns out.
